sources.title: 1949 - The Undercover Man - Relato criminal - Joseph H. Lewis
The Undercover Man (1949) Glenn Ford, Nina Foch, James Whitmore
sources.description: The Undercover Man is a 1949 American crime FILM NOlR directed by Joseph H. Lewis and starring Glenn Ford, Nina Foch and James Whitmore.   The film was based on an article entitled "He Trapped Capone," the first part of the autobiography Undercover Man by Federal Agent Frank J. Wilson, which was serialized in Collier's in 1947.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: Treasury Department agent Frank Warren takes on the case of a mob leader who has evaded paying taxes on his ill-gotten gains.
metadata.Writer: Frank J. Wilson, Jack Rubin, Sydney Boehm
metadata.Actors: Glenn Ford, Nina Foch, James Whitmore
